Author: tigerchik
Text: if there are multiple gyms in your town, you can often get free trials... week at one, week at another ...

Author: DistortionPuddle
Text: \*hug\*  That's a crappy place to be. I'm glad you've been doing so well in recovery! You're doing hard work with few resources. I'm about to cancel my gym membership (it's the hella cheap PF membership, but I never go and I'm too broke to justify a $10/mo subscription that I'm not even using), but someone on another sub just recommended me [darebee.com](https://darebee.com), which I'd never heard of. Definitely planning to summon up motivation to work out at home. I wish you so much health and self-love. <3
